SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_com_page_config (com_id, page_id, page_title_name, page_programme_id, page_type, page_components, tree_code, add_type, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, accept_code) values (#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageTitleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageProgrammeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageComponents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acceptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_com_page_config set com_id=#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, page_id=#{pageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_title_name=#{pageTitleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_programme_id=#{pageProgrammeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_type=#{pageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_components=#{pageComponents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tree_code=#{treeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_type=#{addType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enableflg=#{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by=#{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time=#{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by=#{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time=#{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accept_code=#{acceptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
